wsintelliauction.net

Class MessageSocket

  • java.lang.Object
    • wsintelliauction.net.MessageSocket

  • public class MessageSocket
extends java.lang.Object
    Wraps a standard network socket, adding functionality for handling transmission and reception of messages.
    Author:
    James Lewis

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MessageSocket(Recipient recipient)
      Construct a message socket, given a recipient.
      MessageSocket(java.net.Socket socket)
      Construct the message socket, wrapping the given socket.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void closeSocket()
      Close the socket.
      void closeStreams()
      Close the input and output streams.
      Message readMessage()
      Read a message from the socket's input.
      boolean writeMessage(Message m)
      Write the message to the socket's output.

    • Constructor Detail

      • MessageSocket

        public MessageSocket(java.net.Socket socket)
        Construct the message socket, wrapping the given socket.
        Parameters:
        socket - Destination.

      • MessageSocket

        public MessageSocket(Recipient recipient)
              throws java.io.IOException
        Construct a message socket, given a recipient. A socket for the recipient is instantiated.
        Parameters:
        recipient - Socket destination.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

    • Method Detail

      • closeStreams

        public void closeStreams()
        Close the input and output streams.

      • closeSocket

        public void closeSocket()
        Close the socket.

      • writeMessage

        public boolean writeMessage(Message m)
        Write the message to the socket's output.
        Parameters:
        m - Message to write.
        Returns:
        True if successful, false if write failed.

      • readMessage

        public Message readMessage()
        Read a message from the socket's input. Will block if no messages immediatly in stream.
        Returns:
        Next read message in stream, or null if failed.
